products.name: 5x5 Opaque Panel
products.long_description:
Our original prototype panel featuring a 5×5 grid of addressable LEDs. Perfect for smaller installations or prototyping. Each panel contains 25 individually controllable RGB LEDs with opaque PCB backing for focused light output.

**Use Cases:**
- Small-scale installations
- Prototyping and testing
- Accent lighting
- Legacy system compatibility

media.alt: 5x5 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 5 layers of addressable RGB LEDs
5x5 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 5 layers of addressable RGB LEDs
5x5 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 5 layers of addressable RGB LEDs

products.name: 8x8 Void Panel
products.description: 240mm, 8×8 prototype PCB from 2024 (negative space cut away, 31.6mm spacing)
products.long_description:
Our current-generation panel featuring a refined 8×8 grid with negative space design for enhanced visual depth. The void-style PCB creates floating LED effects perfect for modern installations.

**Key Features:**
- 64 individually addressable RGB LEDs
- Precision-cut negative space design
- Optimized 31.6mm spacing for ideal coverage
- Compatible with our spine connector system
- Designed for scalability (tested up to 80 panels)

**Use Cases:**
- Large-scale installations
- Commercial projects
- Expandable fixtures
- Founder Edition cubes

media.alt: 8x8 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 8 layers of addressable RGB LEDs
5x5 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 5 layers of addressable RGB LEDs with diffusion caps installed

products.name: 4-Output Spine (5v)
products.description: 4 output spine connector for Material-8x8-V units (5v compatible)
products.long_description:
Spine connector designed for vertical stacking of Material-8x8-V panels in 5v systems. Features 4 outputs for connecting multiple panels with proper spacing and power distribution.

**Compatibility:**
- Material-8x8-V panels (31.6mm spacing)
- 5v control units (Control-2-5v)
- Maximum 8-10 panels per system

products.name: 5-Output Spine (5v)
products.description: 5 output spine connector for Material-8x8-V units (5v compatible)
products.long_description:
Extended spine connector with 5 outputs for larger vertical stacks in 5v systems. Provides additional connectivity for more complex configurations.

**Compatibility:**
- Material-8x8-V panels (31.6mm spacing)
- 5v control units (Control-2-5v)
- Maximum 8-10 panels per system

products.name: 4-Output Spine (24v)
products.description: 4 output spine connector for Material-8x8-V units (24v compatible)
products.long_description:
Professional-grade 24v spine connector for scalable installations. Supports larger panel counts and longer cable runs than 5v systems.

**Compatibility:**
- Material-8x8-V panels (31.6mm spacing)
- 24v control units (Control-8-24v, Control-16-24v)
- Scalable to 64-80 panels

products.name: 5-Output Spine (24v)
products.description: 5 output spine connector for Material-8x8-V units (24v compatible)
products.long_description:
Extended 24v spine connector with 5 outputs for large-scale professional installations. Maximum connectivity and flexibility for complex fixtures.

**Compatibility:**
- Material-8x8-V panels (31.6mm spacing)
- 24v control units (Control-8-24v, Control-16-24v)
- Scalable to 64-80 panels

products.name: 12mm Cube Cap
products.long_description:
High-quality SLA 3D printed diffusion cap with cube geometry. Provides even light distribution and professional finish for LED installations.

**Technical Details:**
- SLA printed for high surface quality
- Cube-shaped design
- Perfect fit for WS2812B LEDs
- Material-5x5-O: 25 caps per panel
- Material-8x8-V: 64 caps per panel

products.name: 12mm Sphere Cap
products.long_description:
High-quality SLA 3D printed diffusion cap with spherical geometry. Provides smooth, even light diffusion with a modern aesthetic.

**Technical Details:**
- SLA printed for high surface quality
- Sphere-shaped design
- Perfect fit for WS2812B LEDs
- Material-5x5-O: 25 caps per panel
- Material-8x8-V: 64 caps per panel

products.name: 2-Output Control (5v)
products.description: 5v control unit, supports 8-10 Material-8x8-V panels (2 ESP32 outputs)
products.long_description:
Compact 5v control unit based on ESP32 microcontroller. Perfect for smaller installations and DIY projects. Features 2 outputs for controlling up to 8-10 Material-8x8-V panels.

**Key Features:**
- ESP32-based control
- 2 independent outputs
- WiFi connectivity
- Web-based configuration
- Maximum 8-10 panels (512-640 LEDs)
- Open-source firmware

products.name: 8-Output Control (24v)
products.description: 24v control unit, supports 32-40 Material-8x8-V panels (8 ESP32 outputs)
products.long_description:
Professional-grade 24v control unit for medium to large installations. Features 8 outputs for controlling up to 32-40 Material-8x8-V panels with excellent scalability.

**Key Features:**
- ESP32-based control
- 8 independent outputs
- WiFi connectivity
- Web-based configuration
- Maximum 32-40 panels (2048-2560 LEDs)
- Professional power distribution
- Open-source firmware

products.name: 16-Output Control (24v)
products.description: 24v control unit, supports 64-80 Material-8x8-V panels (16 ESP32 outputs)
products.long_description:
Maximum capacity 24v control unit for large-scale commercial installations. Features 16 outputs for controlling up to 64-80 Material-8x8-V panels.

**Key Features:**
- ESP32-based control
- 16 independent outputs
- WiFi connectivity
- Web-based configuration
- Maximum 64-80 panels (4096-5120 LEDs)
- Professional power distribution
- Open-source firmware
- Designed for commercial installations

products.name: 8x8x8 DIY Cube Kit
products.description: DIY version of the 5v 8-layer original cube
products.long_description:
Build your own LED cube with our comprehensive DIY kit. Includes everything you need to assemble an 8×8×8 fixture (512 addressable LEDs) perfect for makers, hackers, and lighting enthusiasts.

**What's Included:**
- 8× Material-8x8-V panels (BLACK PCB)
- 7× Connect-5x31.6-5v spine connectors
- 1× Control-2-5v control unit
- 512× Diffuse-12-C round diffusion caps
- Assembly instructions and wiring guide
- Access to online configurator tool

**Requirements:**
- Basic soldering skills
- 5V 10A power supply (not included)
- 2-3 hours assembly time

**Note:** DIY kits do not include warranty or assembly service guarantees.

media.alt: 8x8x8 DIY Cube displaying rainbow pattern across 8 layers of addressable RGB LEDs

products.name: Unit 8x8x8
products.description: Hand-assembled 5v 8-layer cube with 10-year warranty and MJN NFT
products.long_description:
Traditional luxury lighting is beautiful, but predictable. Light sculptures on a dimmer. Yawn! Imajin Lighting transforms illumination into an immersive, responsive experience.

Our debut prototype, Unit 8x8x8, is a 240mm, volumetric light array composed of 512 emitters. The Unit offers a rare duality. It can be both static and dynamic. Equally compelling as a work of sculptural stillness or an animated fixture of light and motion.

While the Unit's refined form appears to be a complex interplay of design, hardware, and code, it is simple to instal and user friendly. The interface control is a simple, silky-smooth physical dial offering effortless transitions between moods, tones, and movement. Each client experiences a personalized consultation to tailor unique lighting patterns and behaviors that reflect their environment and aesthetic sensibility.

The Imajin team brings decades of experience in large-scale festivals, cocktail lounges and nightclub lighting design — now reimagined for the home. The Unit channels creative energy into your home with lighting that is captivating, responsive, and redefines \"mood lighting\" to the next level.

products.portfolioCopy:
Traditional luxury lighting is beautiful, but predictable. Light sculptures on a dimmer. Yawn! Imajin Lighting transforms illumination into an immersive, responsive experience.

Our debut prototype, Unit 8x8x8, is a 240mm, volumetric light array composed of 512 emitters. The Unit offers a rare duality. It can be both static and dynamic. Equally compelling as a work of sculptural stillness or an animated fixture of light and motion.

While the Unit's refined form appears to be a complex interplay of design, hardware, and code, it is simple to instal and user friendly. The interface control is a simple, silky-smooth physical dial offering effortless transitions between moods, tones, and movement. Each client experiences a personalized consultation to tailor unique lighting patterns and behaviors that reflect their environment and aesthetic sensibility.

The Imajin team brings decades of experience in large-scale festivals, cocktail lounges and nightclub lighting design — now reimagined for the home. The Unit channels creative energy into your home with lighting that is captivating, responsive, and redefines \"mood lighting\" to the next level.
